mapper.select: select stock_code from stock where stock_code not in ( select distinct t1.stock_code from avg_line as t1, avg_line as t2 where t1.date >= #{start} and t1.stock_code = t2.stock_code and t1.date = t2.date and t1.statistic = 5 and t2.statistic = 10 and t1.avg < t2.avg ) order by stock_code;
select date from avg_line order by date desc limit 1;
mapper.insert:
insert into avg_line (stock_code, date, statistic, current, avg) values
(#{item.stockCode}, #{item.date}, #{item.statistic}, #{item.current}, #{item.avg})
on conflict (stock_code, date, statistic) do update set current = excluded.current, avg = excluded.avg
